amendment.description: To modify the requirement that the Secretary of Defense implement measures to maintain the critical wartime medical readiness skills and core competencies of health care providers within the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4206 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 89.

action.text: Amendment SA 4206 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Fischer. (consideration: CR S3397-3405; text: CR S3397-3398) To modify the requirement that the Secretary of Defense implement measures to maintain the critical wartime medical readiness skills and core competencies of health care providers within the Armed Forces.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4206 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 89.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4206 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Fischer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4206 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 91 - 0. Record Vote Number: 89.
